from: http://members.chello.nl/cvanderlely/bfrond/disco/projects/tapes.htm

The Vaultscan Tapes (1997)

Set of 5 tapes sold during the 1997 tour:

Vaultscan Vol.1 (Unreleased Tracks 86-95)
 Cracked Universe - (track for unfinished project - 1990)
 Through & Through - (demo for Outskirts Of Infinity 2nd album - 1988)
 Christmas Eve - (unreleased - 1992)
 Creeping About - (unused track for Seeds tribute album on Dogmeat - 1993)
 Let Me Live - (home demo - 1994)
 Youngblood - (early version of Time Share Heart - 1993)
 Untogether - (unused Fred Bison track - 1992)
 I Am Just A Child - (unreleased - 1994)
 The Harlesden Shuffle - (unreleased - 1988)
 Where Is It Now? - (unreleased - 1991)
 Coming Round - (home demo - 1991)
 Sunday Song - (unreleased - 1991)
 Not For Now - (home demo - 1994)
 The Pilgrims Way - (unreleased - 1990)
 Scavenger - (unreleased - 1995)
 Psychotherapy - (unreleased - 1994)
 I Bought My Love A Lapdog - (demo - 1994)
 Fuse Blews - (instrumental version - 1992)
 I Eat The Air - (out-take from Inner Marshland - 1987)

Vaultscan Vol.2 (Unreleased Tracks 86-95)
 Chance - (unreleased - 1994)
 New Alexandria - (home demo - 1994)
 Open House - (out-take from Sprawl - 1994)
 Ageing Freak - (unreleased - 1993)
 Drowned - (home demo - 1990)
 Instrumental #1 - (unreleased - 1986)
 Another Song Abour Dying - (unused demo for London Stone - 1991)
 And Now She's Gone - (home demo - 1991)
 Walking In The Lady's Garden - (out-take from Triptych - 1988)
 Gone Away - (unreleased - 1989)
 Right On Hippie Dream - (home demo - 1994)
 Looks Like Rain - (unreleased - 1988)
 Instrumental #2 - (unreleased - 1986)
 Trading Green - (unreleased - 1986)
 Find My Way Home - (unreleased - 1987)
 Son Of Many Mothers - (home demo - 1990)
 Long Day - (unreleased - 1987)
 Hail The Child Philosopher - (unreleased - 1994)
 Stain On The Sun - (home demo - 1990)

Livewired Vol.1 (Live Anthology 90-96)
 Opening Jam - (LU2 - 1993)
 Splendid Isolation - (LU2 - 1993)
 House Of Mountains - (LU3 - 1996)
 Timepiece - (LU4 - 1993)
 Well Out Of It - (LU3 - 1996)
 Undertaker - (LU2 - 1993)
 London Stone - (LU2 - 1993)
 High In A Flat - (LU3 - 1995)
 Eyes In The Back Of My Head - (LU1 - 1990)
 Lights Are Changing - (LU4 - 1993)
 Coming Round - (LU2 - 1993)
 Let Me Live - (LU3 - 1994)
 He'd Be A Diamond - (LU4 - 1993)
 Do Me Down - (LU2 - 1993)
 Olde Worlde - (LU2 - 1993)

Livewired Vol.2 (Live Anthology 90-96)
 Reflections In A Tall Mirror - (LU2 - 1993)
 Time Share Heart - (LU4 - 1993)
 Stain On The Sun - (LU3 - 1994)
 Do Me Down - (LU1 - 1994)
 O Gideon - (LU3 - 1994)
 Maybe - (LU2 - 1993)
 I Can't Cry - (LU3 - 1996)
 Love You More - (LU3 - 1994)
 The Backnang Theme - (LU1 - 1990)
 Dolly Bug - (LU3 - 1996)
 Signed D.C. - (LU3 - 1995)
 God Speed You To Earth - (LU1 - 1990)
 Superseded - (LU3 - 1995)
 New River Head - (LU3 - 1994)
 Stoned Train Driver - (LU3 - 1996)
 Eyes In The Back Of My Head - (LU2 - 1993)

Radio Activity (Radio Sessions)
 Stoned Train Driver - (LU5 - 1995)
 Lights Are Changing - (LU5 - 1995)
 O Gideon - (LU5 - 1995)

 On A Liquid Wheel - (LU4 - 1993)
